derivation: or (Amos 9:1) כַּפְתּוֹר; probably from an unused root meaning to encircle;
outline:
1. bulb, knob, capital, capital of a pillar
    1. knob, bulb (as ornament)
    2. capital (of a pillar)
strongs_def: a chaplet; but used only in an architectonic sense, i.e. the capital of acolumn, or a wreath-like button or disk on the candelabrum
